item.title: Research
item.description: Publications Preprints: Kleywegt, A. J., & Shao, H. (2022). Revenue Management Under the Markov Chain Choice Model with Joint Price and Assortment Decisions. arXiv:2204.04774. Kleywegt, A. J., & Shao, H. (2021). Optimizing Pricing, Repositioning, En-Route Time, and Idle Time in Ride-Hailing Systems. arXiv:2111.11551. Kleywegt, A. J., & Shao, H. (2020). Tractable Constrained Optimization over Multiple Product Attributes under Discrete Choice Models. arXiv:2007.09193. Kleywegt, A. J., & Shao, H. (2020). Joint Estimation of Discrete Choice Model and Arrival Rate with Unobserved Stock-out Events.

item.title: Selecting the Best Cloud GPU Service as of January 2024
item.description:
Summary:

  • Vast AI is the best on-demand service for individual and academic use, provided that the user is comfortable working with cloud servers.

item.title: Crafting Personalized Wallpapers with Your Favorite Quotes
item.description: This project is a simple, single-page web application that allows users to create custom wallpapers from text quotes. The application is built using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript.

item.title: Crafting a 2048 Game with AI's Help
item.description: My discovery of the AI code editor Cursor was nothing short of a revelation, given its remarkable capabilities. Inspired, I decided to challenge it with the creation of a simple game: 2048.
